en-US.description:
To make sure the Skill launches correctly, please say Mawakit.

The MAWAQIT skill allows you to get the prayer times for the mosque of your choice!

For example, you can ask when the next prayer is, what time the Friday prayer is, or what time the third prayer ('Asr) is.
The Skill also allows you to get information about your mosque, to play the classic Adhan or the Adhan for the first prayer of the day (Fajr).

To know all available commands, just say "Alexa, what are the available commands?".

PS: Since Alexa struggles with recognizing the names of prayers, we recommend giving the number of the prayer you are interested in instead of the Arabic name.
For example, if you want to know the time of Fajr, say "Alexa, what time is the first prayer?".
The Adhan will play in Arabic.

If you have any feedback to share with us, feel free to contact us, especially on Twitter/X @MAWAQIT.

We hope you enjoy the Skill, assalamu aleykoum!
en-US.name: MAWAQIT
en-US.summary: MAWAQIT allows you to get the prayer times for your mosque.

La skill MAWAQIT vous permet d'obtenir les heures de pri├¿res de la mosqu├⌐e de votre choix !

Demandez par exemple quelle est la prochaine pri├¿re, ├á quelle heure est la pri├¿re du vendredi, ou encore ├á quelle heure est la troisi├¿me pri├¿re ('Asr).
La Skill vous permet aussi d'avoir des informations sur votre mosqu├⌐e, de lancer l'Adhan classique ou celui de la premi├¿re pri├¿re de la journ├⌐e (Fajr).

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
{"ask_dist_username":"","ask_dist_password":"","ask_dist_testing_instructions":" Intellectual property documentation links:
https://annuaire-entreprises.data.gouv.fr/entreprise/mawaqit-917868135
https://avis-situation-sirene.insee.fr/siege
We have specific permission to use the trademark/brand "Mawaqit". Kindly refer the above links. 
We would like to use 'mawaqit' as invocation word in all locales. 

For testing purposes, 
If there is no mosque nearby your location, Kindly set a location/address of the device which is near France where there are lot of mosques to choose. 

In a real-world scenario, if no mosque is found nearby, the user will receive a prompt informing them accordingly.

Regarding PlayAdhanIntent,
The sound of the Azan will be in Arabic irrespective of the customer's locale. 

For every language saying mawakit instead of mawaqit it will better skill recognition as mentioned in skill description.

For French locales say ikama instead of iqama it will work better for NextIqamaTimeIntent.

 Intellectual property documentation links:
https://annuaire-entreprises.data.gouv.fr/entreprise/mawaqit-917868135
https://avis-situation-sirene.insee.fr/siege"}
